name: BEAN (itch) (The Story Nerd)
description:
It's been about a week since the incident.

You still have trouble sleeping. 

Nightmares.

The nightmares have some of your characters.

Walter, the professional, almost-British, tall dude. 

Sash, the attention-seeking book-reader. 

And of course, Bean, the child-like mascot of your cartoons. 

But they aren't the only things haunting you.

Both of them are there too.  And they want you to look at them...

~~~~~

Made in a little under a month, this FNAF Fangame (featuring original characters, art, story, all that jazz) is just a fun project I wanted to make alongside school. While I don't expect it to be perfect by any means, do let me know if there are any bugs or general fixes you want in the game, as I'll do my best to fix them!
